definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: There are many ways to dispel your pent-up fury besides drinking!
sentences.chinese: 排解自己積憤的方法有很多種，不一定要喝酒呀。

sentences.english: The witness delivered himself of all his pent-up hatred.
sentences.chinese: 證人一股腦發出他的積憤。
